name: The Pearl of Time
description:
This is a game jam entry for Gotm Jam #25.

Walkthrough Controls

  • Left-right arrows (or [A] [D], [J] [L]) to move.

  • [Space] or [C] to jump.

  • [R] to retry level.

  • [F11] to toggle full-screen.

Credits

  • God rays shaders by Peter Höglund.

  • Cozette font by Slavfox.

  • Music and Sound from Mixkit.

  • Background by Tony Pham.

  • Textures:

    • Stone Brick Wall Golgotha from Crack.com.

    • Partially mossy concrete wall by Tiziana.

    • Plants textures Pack by Yughues.

    • ZRPG Beach by Zachariah Husiar.

    • Vines by KnoblePersona.

    • Statues & Fountains Collection by Jordan Irwin.

    • Other from Benkyou Studio's textures.

  • Converted using SLK_img2pixel.
